entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 27 except 21 near Lake Huron.
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 27 except 21 near Lake Huron. Humidex 30. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
